# This file was generated by FRUT's Jucer2CMake from "MyGreatProject.jucer"

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.4)

project("MyGreatProject")


list(APPEND CMAKE_MODULE_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../FRUT/prefix/FRUT/cmake")
set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 17)
include(Reprojucer)
include_directories("/usr/local/lib/gcc/include")


set(MyGreatProject_jucer_FILE
  "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/MyGreatProject.jucer"
)

jucer_project_begin(
  JUCER_FORMAT_VERSION "1"
  PROJECT_FILE "${MyGreatProject_jucer_FILE}"
  PROJECT_ID "ayBOmG"
)

jucer_project_settings(
  PROJECT_NAME "MyGreatProject"
  PROJECT_VERSION "1.0.0"
  USE_GLOBAL_APPCONFIG_HEADER OFF
  ADD_USING_NAMESPACE_JUCE_TO_JUCE_HEADER OFF
  DISPLAY_THE_JUCE_SPLASH_SCREEN ON # Required for closed source applications without an Indie or Pro JUCE license
  PROJECT_TYPE "Audio Plug-in"
  BUNDLE_IDENTIFIER "com.yourcompany.MyGreatProject"
  CXX_LANGUAGE_STANDARD "C++17"
)

jucer_audio_plugin_settings(
  PLUGIN_FORMATS
    "VST3"
    "AU"
    "Standalone"
  # PLUGIN_CHARACTERISTICS
  PLUGIN_NAME "MyGreatProject"
  PLUGIN_DESCRIPTION "MyGreatProject"
  PLUGIN_MANUFACTURER "yourcompany"
  PLUGIN_MANUFACTURER_CODE "Manu"
  PLUGIN_CODE "Aybo"
  # PLUGIN_CHANNEL_CONFIGURATIONS
  PLUGIN_AAX_IDENTIFIER "com.yourcompany.MyGreatProject"
  PLUGIN_AU_EXPORT_PREFIX "MyGreatProjectAU"
  PLUGIN_AU_MAIN_TYPE "kAudioUnitType_Effect"
  PLUGIN_VST3_CATEGORY
    "Fx"
  PLUGIN_RTAS_CATEGORY
    "ePlugInCategory_None"
  PLUGIN_AAX_CATEGORY
    "AAX_ePlugInCategory_None"
  PLUGIN_VST_LEGACY_CATEGORY "kPlugCategEffect"
)

jucer_project_files("MyGreatProject/Source"
# Compile   Xcode     Binary    File
#           Resource  Resource
  x         .         .         "Source/PluginProcessor.cpp"
  .         .         .         "Source/PluginProcessor.h"
  x         .         .         "Source/PluginEditor.cpp"
  .         .         .         "Source/PluginEditor.h"
)

  juce_audio_basics

)

jucer_export_target(
  "Xcode (macOS)"
)

jucer_export_target_configuration(
  "Xcode (macOS)"
  NAME "Debug"
  DEBUG_MODE ON
  BINARY_NAME "MyGreatProject"
)

jucer_export_target_configuration(
  "Xcode (macOS)"
  NAME "Release"
  DEBUG_MODE OFF
  BINARY_NAME "MyGreatProject"
)

jucer_project_end()

# ======================================
# Link SheenBidi on macOS (arm64) builds
# ======================================

if(True)
    # Make sure the library search path is set
    link_directories("/opt/homebrew/lib")

    # If you need the include path:
    include_directories("/opt/homebrew/include")

    # Link SheenBidi to your "Shared Code" target
    # because that's where JUCE actually calls into the library.

    target_link_libraries(MyGreatProject_Shared_Code
        PRIVATE
            sheenbidi
    )
endif()

add_executable(test_plugins Source/TDD/test_plugins.cpp)

target_link_libraries(test_plugins PRIVATE
        MyGreatProject_Shared_Code
)

target_include_directories(test_plugins PRIVATE
        # add the path(s) where JuceHeader.h is generated/found
        "${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}"
        "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../JUCE/modules"
        # etc.
)
